alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:59AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Martin, southeastern Greene and northeastern Daviess Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 559 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bloomfield to 8 miles northeast of Washington. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Martin, southeastern Greene and northeastern Daviess Counties, including the following locations... Newberry, Odon, Loogootee, West Boggs Lake, Crane, Burns City and Cannelburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
